title: Generic webhook endpoint
description: Generalize existing budget alert webhook into a generic endpoint where external systems can trigger pre-configured agent tasks via POST /v1/webhooks/:name, with HMAC verification, prompt template rendering, async LLM execution, and optional result callback.

tasks.title: Add webhook_executions table and store methods
Add CLI commands (webhook list, webhook history)
